name: Hebereke's Popoon
description: Hebereke's Popoon (へべれけのぽぷーん, Hebereke no Popūn) is a two player puzzle video game developed and published by Sunsoft. It is based on the Hebereke series. Hebereke means drunk or untrustworthy. Popoon is an onomatopoeia for the sound made by the game pieces when they explode.
